name: The Mosestor
description:
this game is Kind of a 2D horror game inside a maze.
You need to find your friend who entered the maze and did not return when you entered the maze you did not know that you were infested with bloodthirsty monsters.
Now you have to find your friend while avoiding the monsters.
WSAD to move a mouse to light up the area When you turn off the flashlight
You will have to clash
In the wall to get him back into action.
Playing this software in 4 hours for a challenge is not so good
